website_summaries.verdict: Walks you through more than 100 fun learning activities for the great outdoors.
pros: Learning activities based on play in a stimulating environment
Organized by activity level, loudness, and messiness
Icons indicate which skills are targeted
Creative, inexpensive activities with mostly household items
Even Kindergarten and older find these fun
cons: Requires some planning and material gathering

customer_reviews.title: A treasure trove!
customer_reviews.text: A treasure trove for young kids and parents. The age-appropriate activities are color-coded by child development stages. Each activity is written like a recipe with materials, preparation time, and sequenced events which makes them easy. I like the outdoor emphasis. Kids who learn to play and learn outside will keep it up later. More nature, less electronic device dependence!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Brune

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Super fun. We did the nature wand activity today and my kids had a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great fun even for ages 6+!
customer_reviews.text: This book has been such a great asset to our family! My children are 4 and 6 and we love to look through the book and pick activities to do! Our favorites have been the Bird Feeder Castle and making our own Play Dough and imprinting it with what we find outdoors. This would make an excellent gift for expecting parents, new parents, or for anyone who needs some guidance with fun ways to play with children.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wellington

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this book.....it has all kinds of fun activities to do outside with your kids! They are fun and education and usually only require things you have around the house or that you can find outside! I can wait to do some of these with my grand kids! Also - check out the Rainy Day Toddler Activity Book for indoor ideas!! Both books are great for parents, grandparents, home school moms, or preschool teachers!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Kahir Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome collection of activities that can be altered for any young age!
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: Love this book
customer_reviews.text: This has the best activities for outdoors and we do a lot of fun outdoor activities to begin with but this has so much more that I haven’t thought of.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: I love this book it's super cute and easy and we'll put together if buy it again for a gift, were gonna have fun this summer. It seems like over the years I've lost a lot of my creativity so I'm so glad someone with what I used to have, plus child development experience wrote a book to help thanks so much
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, especially for kids 5 and under
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2 year old but my 4 year old enjoys the activities too. I'm really pleased with the ease & simplicity of the activity set up, and my kids enjoy doing these. The activities have been a great jumping off point for imaginative play. My older kids are able to set up and run some of the activities too, and they love playing "baby sitter" with the younger ones. The skills taught are perfect for this age. We also bought Toddler activities made easy, which is a great companion book.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: wonderful book
customer_reviews.text: I really like this book! some of the activities are silly (like stomping in a puddle after the rain) but if you want to really be active with your baby you can make an activity calendar and attache it to the book. I wish the author attached more pictures/drawings to activities especially since there is enough room to do so. I would have given it 5 stars. I do love the book and will recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: There are so many fun ideas in this book. I am Nana of the year because we do so many different activities when my granddaughters come to stay with me!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great ideas
customer_reviews.text: Many ideas inside this book to help keep your little one entertained. I’d buy this for my Teacher friends. Gives you step by step on what to do and how much you’d need of product for whichever activities.
customer_reviews.author: Aspen

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter loves this workbook! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: JLoop

customer_reviews.title: So many new ideas
customer_reviews.text: I like to pride my self when it comes to activities with my children! I try to stay very hands on. I got this book thinking I may get a couple little ideas from it, but it has SO many!!! I am blown away by the creativity of some of the tasks. Love this
customer_reviews.author: Casi

customer_reviews.title: Could Not Be More Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I only got it this morning and already I can tell you I’m 200% satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok at best.
customer_reviews.text: It is ok. Could use Google for the same or more ideas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift for a teacher and mother of a todler
customer_reviews.text: She loved the book and said it had lessons to use with her daughter. A great book with project ideas to keep you and your children busy.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Bianchi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I am rather disappointed in this book. There are so many activities that are a great deal of messiness with not a great outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had more pictures
customer_reviews.text: It’d a nice book but I wish I’d had more pictures of the activities. Other than that I can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: bethany eaton

customer_reviews.title: My niece loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my niece for Christmas. She is always looking for fun things to do with her toddler and she just loved this.
customer_reviews.author: Poker fan

customer_reviews.title: Creative
customer_reviews.text: Has very good, creative ideas for all ages and types of weather. Easy too.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Good book
customer_reviews.text: Great ideas while quarantined. We used this book to keep the kids entertained.
customer_reviews.author: AMS80

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver for our daughter and her 2 year old son during this pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: KCL

customer_reviews.title: Great activity book!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift, but I did take a look through it. It had some cute activities for little ones. The receiver sent me a video of her and her little one doing one of the activities. I would never have thought of it. Would gift it again!
customer_reviews.author: pkay

customer_reviews.title: Racist Caricature in Book
customer_reviews.text: At least one of the illustrations is a racist caricature. It's very offensive!
customer_reviews.author: Primester52139

customer_reviews.title: Quality Book
customer_reviews.text: So many great activities, I was pleased to see a lot of different activities and not just a compilation of things I’ve already seen on Pinterest! The book itself is thoughtfully laid out too with cute artwork.
customer_reviews.author: meagan

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Especially during quarantine!
customer_reviews.text: Such creative ideas that make you wonder why you didn't think about them!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: A must for Todd moms/dads
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for your little ones best for ages 12 months - about 6 years (: great ideas for thriving little minds
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Just got book and have skimmed through activities. Looks like a lot if fun, very excited to start these with my boys!
customer_reviews.author: Jubilee F.

customer_reviews.title: Great book to keep toddlers entertained!
customer_reviews.text: Love this book!! Great ideas to keep my little one entertained outside for years to come! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Such a great resource!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun book! Super informative with tons of good ideas. Very excited to use these play ideas with my toddler!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun, easy things to do
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in-law loved it for my grandson. great projects for his age.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: A+ Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this book! I’m a nanny and sometimes it is difficult to think of creative things to do with kids without toys. These activities are fun and educational!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Love these activities for my toddler classroom!
customer_reviews.text: My classroom of toddlers is BUSY, so we go outside a lot. Sometimes we spend a great deal of our morning outside, so having extra activities on hand is appreciated. The Outdoor Toddler Activity Book is a great resource because I can immediately see what skills each activity works on, something that is important for all early childhood teachers. The layout of each page is easy to read and I can quickly find what's needed for each activity before collecting materials from our preschool storage room. I definitely recommend The Outdoor Toddler Activity Book for anyone who works with toddlers - it is a wonderful resource! Disclosure: I was given a digital copy of this book for free.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl C

customer_reviews.title: Parents, Teachers, Children..A MUST for all of us!
customer_reviews.text: What a fabulous book! This is wonderful far beyond the toddler years. It is well written and set up for anyone to easily follow. I love how the activities are almost like recipes. They also share what area of development that the activity will impact. The photos and illustrations are beautiful! This would be a great gift for a teacher, birthday or new parent! It's a way to get us all outside to play, get messy and have fun! This book is going to be countless hours of fun for years to come! 5 stars and beyond!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bednarek

customer_reviews.title: Great way to make the outside even more fun!
customer_reviews.text: We love this book! It helps us create more activities to do outside. When you don't live in the country and you don't have a lot to do outside, this book will help give you ideas. Find some quick and easy ideas that will not break your budget and will give your kids hours of fun and learning play. You will be making some special memories while sharing time with your kids. We are looking forward to more warm days to play and try out all of these Learning activities.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Cole

customer_reviews.title: Super fun activities
customer_reviews.text: The beginning is informational and relatable. My children are older but many of the activities in the book will still be a blast to do with them. I enjoyed reading and can't wait to try some of the activities!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A keeper
customer_reviews.text: Great book with ideas to play with toddlers. BONUS- older children enjoy many of these activities as well. Need to buy another for an upcoming baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: A great resource for early education professionals.
customer_reviews.text: As a Early Childhood educator who works closely with students with many sensory needs, this book is refreshing and full of fun learning activities. I am looking forward to implementing many of these wonderful ideas with my students.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: So far, I really love this book. I love the way it is formatted. Educational, but also fun! Highly recommend for any at-home parents running out of ideas for activities with their toddler. I think some of these activities can also be done indoors. It is a lot of reading for parents.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This book is AWESOME! It contains lots of fun ideas that will help a toddler to learn through outdoor exploration and play. I look forward to doing these activities with my 2 year old, especially the painted picnic tablecloth. We may even modify the activity to a painted t-shirt!
customer_reviews.author: Micah Negley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Resource!
customer_reviews.text: There are so many great ideas in this book! I want to do them all at once with my LO.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Price

product_meta.title: The Outdoor Toddler Activity Book: 100+ Fun Early Learning Activities for Outside Play
